title: Bitcoin Market Watch: Nvidia Earnings, Fed Minutes and Payrolls to Set The Tone
contentSnippet: Investors navigate AI driven volatility, rate cut uncertainty and critical economic data releases.

title: Hanging in There: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Nov. 19, 2025

title: Aster drops ‘Machi mode’ to reward getting rekt as Machi leads liquidations
contentSnippet: Machi Big Brother dominates the liquidation leaderboard with 71 liquidations so far this month, far ahead of James Wynn and Andrew Tate.

title: New Hampshire approves first-of-its-kind $100M Bitcoin-backed municipal bond
contentSnippet: New Hampshire has approved a $100 million Bitcoin-backed municipal conduit bond, letting borrowers raise capital against overcollateralized BTC.

title: Strategy rides out Bitcoin crash, still on track for S&P 500 spot: Matrixport
contentSnippet: Strategy remains poised for an S&P 500 inclusion in 2025, as the world’s largest Bitcoin holder is unlikely to have to liquidate its holdings to service its debt.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Altcoins Show Signs of Life as Bitcoin Holds Key Support Above $88K
contentSnippet: With bitcoin stabilizing near critical support, traders shifted into altcoins, sparking sharp rebounds across a market still gripped by extreme fear.

title: BlackRock leads near $3B Bitcoin November ETF exodus with record $523M outflows
contentSnippet: US Bitcoin ETFs are nearing $3 billion in November outflows as a fresh death cross, fading Fed rate cut odds, and smart money shorts weigh on sentiment.

title: US and UK revolt forces Basel to rethink brutal crypto capital rules for banks
contentSnippet: Basel’s toughest crypto rules are under review as the US, UK, and the EU diverge, with booming stablecoin adoption forcing a rethink of 1,250% capital charges, the group’s chair told the FT.

title: Ondo wins Liechtenstein approval to offer tokenized stocks in Europe
contentSnippet: US tokenization platform Ondo is preparing to offer tokenized stocks and ETFs in 30 European countries after receiving approval in Liechtenstein.

title: Senators warn Trump-linked crypto firm may pose national security threat
contentSnippet: Democratic senators are urging a probe into WLFI over alleged token sales to North Korea- and Russia-linked wallets, while researchers say some claims stem from false positives.

title: ストラテジーのセイラー会長、ウォール街参入による「ビットコイン弱体化」論を否定
contentSnippet: ストラテジーのセイラー会長がフォックス・ビジネスで、機関投資家の参入によりビットコインのボラティリティが大幅に低下していると発言した。2020年の約80%から現在50%まで縮小し、今後はS&P500の1.5倍程度に収束すると予測している。

title: アーク・インベスト、コインベースとサークル株を買い増し
contentSnippet: ARK投資のキャシー・ウッド氏、コインベースとサークル株を計720万ドル購入。ステーブルコイン市場の成長を見据え、仮想通貨関連株への投資を拡大。

title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF, IBIT, Posts Record One-Day Outflow of $523.2 Million
contentSnippet: The average spot bitcoin ETF buyer sits near a $90,000 cost basis, leaving most investors roughly flat.

title: Hyperliquid Unveils HIP-3 Growth Mode, Slashing Fees by 90% to Boost New Markets
contentSnippet: Hyperliquid has launched HIP-3 growth mode, allowing permissionless market deployment with significantly reduced fees to enhance liquidity.

title: Coinbase working on prediction markets website, tech researcher says
contentSnippet: Tech researcher Jane Manchun Wong, who has discovered unreleased features on Facebook and X, has found that Coinbase is working on a prediction markets website.

title: From $140K Call to $85K Put: Bitcoin Positioning Reverses Completely
contentSnippet: The price of bitcoin has dropped over 25% to $91,000 since Oct. 8.

title: Saylor shrugs off suggestion Wall Street ‘hurt’ Bitcoin amid latest crash
contentSnippet: Strategy’s Michael Saylor says Bitcoin has been “getting a lot less” volatile despite its recent price plunge, contradicting the outlook of many crypto analysts.

title: Senator Tim Scott pushes for December vote on crypto market bill
contentSnippet: Senate Banking Chair Tim Scott says the committee could mark up a crypto market structure bill in December, sending it to President Donald Trump for early 2026.

title: ブラジル、仮想通貨のクロスボーダー決済に課税検討　規制強化で抜け穴封じ＝報道
contentSnippet: ブラジル政府が仮想通貨を利用したクロスボーダー決済への課税を検討している。中央銀行は2026年2月から新規制を施行し、ステーブルコインを含む国際送金を外為取引として扱う方針だが、税収漏れ対策として金融取引税（IOF）の対象とする案が浮上している。

title: サークルが「xリザーブ」発表、USDC担保型ステーブルコインを展開可能に
contentSnippet: サークルがブロックチェーン間でUSDC担保型ステーブルコインを展開可能にする相互運用インフラ「xリザーブ」を発表した。

title: 米SEC、2026年度検査で仮想通貨監視を重点項目から削除　規制緩和加速
contentSnippet: 米SECが2026年度の検査優先事項から仮想通貨監視を除外。トランプ政権下で規制姿勢が執行重視から対話重視に転換。コインベースやリップルとの訴訟解決など、業界への軟化姿勢が鮮明に。

title: Asia Morning Briefing: BTC Market Stress Reveals a New Crypto Order
contentSnippet: Market observers note stable XRP/BTC and ETH/BTC ranges and an unusually balanced top-20 ranking, signaling fundamentals-driven dispersion rather than a broad alt season.

title: イーサリアム財団、レイヤー2を単一チェーンのように操作できる「相互運用レイヤー」構想
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨イーサリアムの財団が複数のL2を単一チェーンのように操作できる相互運用レイヤー（EIL）の構想を解説。現在開発中のEILへの参加を呼びかけている。

title: コインベース上のモナドICO、開始23分で65億円弱調達も販売ペース鈍化
contentSnippet: コインベースで開始されたモナド（Monad）のトークンセールは、開始23分で64.5億円を調達したが、その後失速。高いFDV評価額やVC比率の高さが投資家の慎重姿勢を招いたとみられる。

title: 全米初のビットコイン担保地方債、米ニューハンプシャー州が承認
contentSnippet: ニューハンプシャー州が全米初のビットコイン担保地方債を承認した。1億ドル規模の債券でデジタル資産が140兆ドル規模の世界債券市場に参入する道を開く可能性が出た。

title: ハイパーリキッド・ストラテジーズ、ナスダック上場に向けた合併が延期に
contentSnippet: ソネット・バイオセラピューティクスらの合併によるハイパーリキッド財務企業の上場が延期された。株主投票の賛成票が必要数に達していない形だ。

title: アルトコイン現物ETFへの資金循環か　ビットコインとイーサリアムの商品から資金の純流出続く
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ビットコインとイーサリアムの現物ETFは、資金が純流出する日が継続している。この点について、ソラナやXRPなどのETFに資金が循環している可能性が指摘された。

title: Trump Congressional Ally Discloses Latest Six-Figure Bitcoin Purchase
contentSnippet: Brandon Gill has purchased up to $2.6 million in Bitcoin this year, according to House transaction reports.

title: Kraken Scores $800M Raise Backed by $200M Citadel Securities Investment
contentSnippet: The funding, which values Kraken at $20B, accelerates plans to integrate traditional markets with crypto infrastructure across multiple regions.

title: Crypto Exchange Kraken Raises $800 Million at a $20 Billion Valuation
contentSnippet: Kraken just raised $800 million, including $200 million from Ken Griffin’s Citadel Securities, ahead of a potential IPO.

title: Bitcoin Billionaire Arthur Hayes Blames Crypto Plunge on 'Contraction in Dollar Liquidity'
contentSnippet: Former BitMEX CEO Arthur Hayes thinks that Bitcoin could plummet to the low $80,000s before rising as high as $250,000 by year’s end.

title: 'Permissionless Assets’: Robinhood’s 3-Phase Tokenization Plan to Disrupt TradFi
contentSnippet: Robinhood is working on infrastructure developments, said Offchain Labs' A.J. Warner, including 24/7 trading, and leveraging technologies like Arbitrum Stylus for compatibility.

title: Hawk Tuah Girl Added to Solana Meme Coin Lawsuit—After She Cooperated With Law Firm
contentSnippet: After initially being left out, Haliey “Hawk Tuah” Welch has been named in a class action suit against the creators of the meme coin she promoted.

title: Man Who Went By 'Shrek' Pleads Guilty to Helping Steal $263 Million in Crypto
contentSnippet: Authorities say stolen money was spent on luxury goods and exotic cars.

title: Bitcoin ATM Company Founder Charged in Alleged $10 Million Money Laundering Scheme
contentSnippet: Federal prosecutors in Chicago said the operator of a Bitcoin ATM network took in illicit funds and moved them through digital wallets.

title: Treasury Dept. Says Banks Can Keep Crypto On Their Balance Sheets in Certain Cases
contentSnippet: National banks can now officially hold crypto to pay for network gas fees and engage in other crypto-related experiments, the OCC said Tuesday.

title: Canada Approves Budget That Advances Policy for Stablecoins
contentSnippet: The Canadian government narrowly won favor in Parliament for its budget push that includes a new policy governing stablecoins.

title: Crypto Selloff, REKT Dip, Monad Launch, & DAT trades!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors are very red as btc briefly fell below $90k; btc -4% at $91,300; eth -5% at $3,050, bnb -2% at $915, sol -3% at $137. Icp (+9%), aster (+7%) and hype (+5%) led top movers. Crypto fear &

title: Did El Salvador Really Just Buy $100 Million in Bitcoin?
contentSnippet: The IMF has insisted that past increases were internal transfers.

title: Google Releases Its Most Powerful AI Model, Gemini 3—Here's What You Need to Know
contentSnippet: Google's Gemini 3 Pro outperforms previous models across reasoning and multimodal benchmarks. It's available on AI Studio, but not the consumer Gemini app.
